body_html: Also I suppose that an newbie has high probably to be exposed to high level api like keras and estimators and probably he wants to check quickly performance information on the tensorboard instead of tfprof as a first approach to profiling. So it is better to document how to quickly enable runtime statistics in TB for high level api. /cc @fchollet
